New_Brunswick.George Street Playhouse:
George Street Playhouse is a theatre in New Brunswick, New Jersey in the city's Civic Square government and theatre district. It one of the state's preeminent professional theatres committed to the production of new and established plays.
Under the leadership of Artistic Director David Saint and Managing Director Kelly Ryman, George Street Playhouse is a nationally recognized proscenium theatre, presenting an acclaimed mainstage season while providing an artistic home for established and emerging theatre artists.
